FdoINetworkWithinCostCommand Class Reference

#include <INetworkWithinCost.h>

Inherits FdoINetworkCommand.

Inheritance diagram for FdoINetworkWithinCostCommand:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

FdoIWithinCostCommand subclasses from FdoINetworkCommand and is the interface that defines the FDO network within cost analysis feature. An instance can be created through the FdoIConnection::CreateCommand method. Not all FDO providers will support this command. The FdoICommandCapability should be used to verify if a given provider support this command.

Note:
This Help topic is provided for informational use only. There is no interface or support provided. Autodesk reserves the right to change the software related to the content herein.

Definition at line 38 of file INetworkWithinCost.h.


Public Member Functions

virtual FDO_API void SetCost (double cost)=0
 This method is used to set the cost value. This value will be used to limit the network analysis to a given cost.
virtual FDO_API void SetStartNetworkFeature (GisString *className, FdoPropertyValueCollection *featId)=0
 This method is used to set the starting point of the network analysis. The starting network feature must be set before the command is executed.
